product_name: DryGuy GreenHeat Rechargeable Hand Warmer - 2000 mAh
long_description: The DryGuy GreenHeat Rechargeable Hand Warmer will not only keep your hands warm for 2 hrs. on a chilly winter day, it can also recharge your cell phone or other digital device. Charge up the hand warmer from any USB port before you hit the slopes or head out for a walk; it takes 2 - 3 hrs. to fully charge the built-in 2000 mAh lithium-ion battery. Hand warmer operates on high and low settings; high reaches a temperature of approximately 118degF and will run for about 1 hr. 30 min. Low reaches a temperature of approximately 107degF and will run for about 2 hrs. 10 min. Connect the hand warmer to your smartphone with the included USB/micro USB cable to recharge your phone's battery. Stow the DryGuy GreenHeat Rechargeable Hand Warmer in the included knit sleeve to protect it while you're on the go.
short_description: The DryGuy GreenHeat Rechargeable Hand Warmer will not only keep your hands warm for 2 hrs. on a chilly winter day, it can also recharge your cell phone or other digital device.
